appsgate.lig.core.object.spec
Interface CoreObjectSpec

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConfigurableClockImpl, EnoceanContactSensorImpl, EnoceanKeyCardSensorImpl, EnoceanLuminositySensorImpl, EnoceanOnOffAcuatorImpl, EnoceanPlugAcuatorSensorImpl, EnoceanSwitchSensorImpl, EnoceanTemperatureSensorImpl, EnoceanUndefinedSensorImpl, Gmail, GoogleCalendarImpl, MediaBrowserAdapter, MediaPlayerAdapter, PhilipsHUEImpl, SimulatedOnOffAcuatorImpl, SimulatedTemperatureSensorImpl, WattecoCO2Impl, WattecoOccupancyImpl, WattecoSmartPlugImpl, WattecoTemperatureImpl, YahooWeatherImpl
public interface CoreObjectSpec

This java interface is an ApAM specification shared by all ApAM AppsGate specification to share the AbstractObjectSpec java interface.

Since:
February 13, 2013
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Cédric Gérard

Method Detail

getAbstractObjectId

java.lang.String getAbstractObjectId()
This generic method allow caller to get the object id, whatever the real object type.

Returns:
the real object identifier

getUserType

java.lang.String getUserType()
This method allow the caller to get a user friendly description of the object type.

Returns:
the user friendly type

getObjectStatus

int getObjectStatus()
This method allow the caller to get the current object status. Status values: 0 = Off line or out of range 1 = In validation mode (test range for sensor for instance) 2 = In line or connected

Returns:
an integer that represent the current status

getPictureId

java.lang.String getPictureId()
This method allow the caller to get the current picture of this object.

Returns:
the id of the corresponding picture

getDescription

org.json.JSONObject getDescription()
                                   throws org.json.JSONException
Get the JSON of an object

Returns:
the description as an JSONObject
Throws:
org.json.JSONException

setPictureId

void setPictureId(java.lang.String pictureId)
Change the current picture for this device

Parameters:
pictureId - the new picture identifier
